metadata.Title: CVE-2017-17784 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description:
In GIMP 2.8.22, there is a heap-based buffer over-read in load_image in plug-ins/common/file-gbr.c in the gbr import parser, related to mishandling of UTF-8 data.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-17784` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

gimp - 2.8.10-0ubuntu1.2
gimp-data - 2.8.10-0ubuntu1.2
libgimp2.0 - 2.8.10-0ubuntu1.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: gimp package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.8.10-0ubuntu1.2').
